lines.text: Loni, I know this will sound really stupid... but I've never been with a guy before. You know, intimately.
Well, there is nothing wrong with that. We all do what we want sexually. Nobody forces us.
[after noticing David's excitement upon helping caller Carla help herself]
David, I was, ah, spot checking calls and I caught your last one. I must say, you certainly know what you're doing. How did you learn so much about women?
I... I don't know, I was just doing my job...
Well, you seem to have taken care of her problem quite satisfactory. And, as your supervisor, I feel it's my duty to take care of yours.
[after Cheryl accepts a quickie with him when he saves her job by disproving the computer theory]

Look, Cheryl, I don't want you to think of this as some part of a deal, okay? Just think of it as a new beginning. Now I'm not gonna fuck you. And I'm not gonna make love to you. I'm gonna do both at the same time.
[after Loni and Fishbait finish having sex, Fishbait receives a phone call from a customer praising the operators]
Loni, that call should please you.
